Name: fdwvalidator
Description: References a validator function that is responsible\n for checking the validity of the generic options given to the foreign-data wrapper, as well as to foreign servers and user mappings using the foreign-data wrapper. Zero if no validator is provided.

Name: fdwacl
Description: Access privileges; see GRANT and REVOKE for details

Name: fdwoptions
Description: Foreign-data wrapper specific options, as\n "keyword=value" strings
